<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks">
    <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <acceptance_criteria>New p1 incident is created with the copied fields.
old incident is set to Oh-Hold > Awaiting Major incident
related to the new Incident number</acceptance_criteria>
        <active>true</active>

        <company display_value="GB3">b771e09e4f6463007e72aa95d310c784</company>
        <description>Add a new UI Action: Create a Major incident which will re-direct the user to a new Incident.
The new incident Priotiy will be = 1
and in the related record, the source incident will be realted.
The fields that will be copied over:
short_descrition
description
category
sub_category
caller

The old incident will be set as On-Hold > Awaiting Major Incident with the relevent record related to it.</description>
        <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 01:30:00</estimated_hours>
